scripts.start-back: cd backend && npm i && npm start
scripts.start-front: cd backend && npm i && npm start
scripts.create-db: cd backend && npx sequelize db:create && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.dbr: cd backend && npx sequelize db:drop && npx sequelize db:create && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx sequelize db:seed:all
